input.sentences: during a visit to my hometown i decided to stroll down memory lane .
my old school looks oddly smaller than i remember .
so many memories in the school yard where i made lifelong friends .
it was sad to see the basketball net in disrepair .
the front door was open so i took this shot before leaving .
output.sentences: He decided to visit his old High School. As he strolled by it, memories formed.
He had an oddly familiar memory at the courtyard of the school.
He had memories of playing hopscotch in the yard of the school.
He was sad to see the basketball net be in such disrepair.
He took a shot of a classroom from the front hallway with his film camera.
